```{r read-data}
#Getting resource from Open Data Toronto, filtering for .xls file only. 
paramedic_data <- list_package_resources("https://open.toronto.ca/dataset/paramedic-services-incident-data/") %>% 
  filter(name == "paramedic-services-incident-data-2010-2020") %>%
  get_resource()

#Saving only the 2020 sheet for data analysis
paramedic2020 <- paramedic_data[["2020"]]
```
